content: Shared folders will be imported into the Rooms section as rooms with users who were granted access. Please note: some access rights may get lost during import

comment.text: Shared folders will be imported into the Rooms section as rooms with users who were granted access. Some access rights may get lost during import. This message appears in the Import Shared Folders settings section, informing users about the process of importing shared folders and potential loss of access rights.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'köçürüləcək' (will be migrated) doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'imported'. 'İdxal ediləcək' would be a more accurate translation of 'imported' in this context, relating to the data import process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Paylaşılan qovluqlar istifadəçilərə giriş icazəsi verilmiş otaqlar kimi Otaqlar bölməsinə idxal ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Zəhmət olmasa, nəzərə alın:' is a bit formal and could be softened for better user experience. While grammatically correct, it creates a slightly abrupt tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xahiş edirik, nəzərə alın:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'входирани' (vhodirani) is not the standard or most accurate translation for 'imported' in this context. It implies a more formal or bureaucratic import process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Споделените папки ще бъдат импортирани в секцията Стаи като стаи с потребители, на които е предоставен достъп.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Моля, обърнете внимание:' could be more naturally expressed as 'Имайте предвид:' or simply incorporated into the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Имайте предвид: някои права за достъп може да се загубят по време на импортиране.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "some access rights may get lost" is translated as "Jotkin käyttöoikeudet saattavat hävitä". While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'Osa käyttöoikeuksista saattaa kadota' or 'Käyttöoikeuksista osa saattaa hävitä'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttöoikeuksista osa saattaa hävitä

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Dossiers partagés sont importés" is grammatically awkward. 'Sont importés' is a passive construction that doesn't flow naturally. A more natural phrasing would use the active voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dossiers partagés sont importés dans la section Salles, et apparaissent comme des salles avec les utilisateurs auxquels on a accordé l'accès.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "autorisations d'accès" is understandable, it’s a bit clunky. The original English uses "access rights", a more common phrasing.  A more direct and natural translation would be 'droits d'accès'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remarque: il se peut que certains droits d'accès soient perdus lors de l'importation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Remarque:' followed by a colon can feel a bit formal and less friendly for user-facing text. A slightly less formal approach might improve the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Attention : il se peut que certains droits d'accès soient perdus lors de l'importation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Համօգտագործվող թղթապանակները" (Hamogtorstvogh tghtapanakner) doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'Shared folders'. A more accurate translation might be something like 'Ընդհանուր թղթապանակները' (Endhanur tghtapanakner) or 'Բաժանված թղթապանակները' (Bajanvad tghtapanakner).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ընդհանուր թղթապանակները կներմուծվեն «Սենյակներ» բաժին՝ որպես սենյակներ, որոնց մուտքի թույլտվություն է տրվել օգտվողներին: Խնդրում ենք նկատի ունենալ՝ մուտքի որոշ իրավունքներ կարող են կորել ներմուծման ընթացքում

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "注意" (note) feels a little abrupt in Japanese. It might read better with a slightly softer transition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 共有フォルダは、アクセス権が付与されたユーザーのルームとして「ルーム」セクションにインポートされます。なお、一部のアクセス権は、インポート中に失われる場合があります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "방 섹션에 액세스 권한이 부여된 사용자가 있는 방으로" is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it's repetitive and could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공유된 폴더는 방 섹션에 사용자별로 방으로 가져오기됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of the first sentence and a colon before '참고:'. This is technically acceptable, but a full stop at the end of the '참고' section would be more consistent with typical Korean writing style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공유된 폴더는 방 섹션에 사용자별로 방으로 가져오기됩니다. 참고: 가져오기하는 동안 일부 액세스 권한이 손실될 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ກະ​ລຸ​ນາ​ບັນ​ທຶກ​' (Please note) is a bit awkward in this context. While grammatically correct, it's a very formal way of saying 'Please note.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະ​ລຸ​ນາ​ສັງ​ເກດ​ (Please observe/notice)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ສິດ​ໃນ​ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ບາງ​ຢ່າງ' (some access rights) is a bit literal and could be improved for natural Lao flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສິດ​ໃນ​ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ບາງ​ອັນ (some access rights - slightly more natural phrasing)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'granted access' is overly literal. A more natural translation in Portuguese would be 'que tiveram acesso' or 'com acesso'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: As pastas compartilhadas serão importadas para a seção salas como salas com usuários que tiveram acesso.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'some access rights' can be better translated to convey the meaning. The current translation is acceptable but a more natural phrasing exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Observação: alguns direitos de acesso podem ser perdidos durante a importação. Alternatively, 'alguns direitos de acesso podem não ser mantidos durante a importação'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ca sălile cu utilizatorii" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "as rooms with users". It's literally translated as "as the rooms with the users" which is not natural Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folderele partajate vor fi importate în secțiunea Săli, creând săli cu utilizatorii cărora li s-a acordat accesul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Săli' (rooms) should be capitalized properly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folderele partajate vor fi importate în secțiunea Săli, creând săli cu utilizatorii cărora li s-a acordat accesul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'drepturi de acces' is a bit formal. A more natural phrasing might be better for a settings description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: este posibil ca unele permisiuni să se piardă în timpul importului

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "බෙදාගත් බහාලුම්" (bedagath bahaluum) translates to 'shared containers' or 'shared packages' which isn't the best fit for 'shared folders'. A more appropriate term for 'shared folders' would be 'බෙදාගත් ෆෝල්ඩර්' (bedagath folder) or 'කොටස්' (kotas - meaning sections/shares).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'බෙදාගත් බහාලුම්' with 'බෙදාගත් ෆෝල්ඩර්' or 'කොටස්'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්" (pravechaya laba dee athi pariseelakayin) translates to 'users to whom access has been given', which is grammatically correct but a bit verbose. A more natural translation would be 'permissions have been given to users' or similar. This makes the sentence flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing 'ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' to something more concise like 'permissions have been given to users' or similar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure is a bit clunky. Consider breaking it up for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence for improved flow and readability. For example: 'බෙදාගත් ෆෝල්ඩර් ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇති පරිශ්‍රීලකයින් සමඟ කාමර කොටසට ආයාත කෙරේ. ඇතැම් අවස්ථාවලදී, ආයාතය අතරතුර ප්‍රවේශ අයිතීන් අහිමි විය හැකියි.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses a colon (':') after 'Upozornenie:'. While grammatically correct, it might be more natural in this context to use a dash (–) or no punctuation at all, to mirror the original English phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing ':' with '–' or removing it entirely (e.g., 'Upozornenie – počas importu sa môžu stratiť niektoré prístupové práva.' or 'Upozornenie počas importu sa môžu stratiť niektoré prístupové práva.')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Mape v skupni rabi" is a literal translation of "Shared folders" but might not be the most natural phrasing in Slovenian. A more common and understandable translation might be "Skupne mape" or potentially "Datotečne mape v skupni rabi" depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupne mape

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Upoštevajte: med uvozom se lahko nekatere pravice dostopa izgubijo" is grammatically correct but could be phrased more naturally. The word 'lahko' makes it sound like a possibility and not a certainty. Given the warning aspect of the content, a more definite phrase is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pozor: med uvozom lahko nekatere pravice dostopa izpadejo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'приступ' (access) is used repeatedly. While technically correct, it sounds a little repetitive. Consider varying the wording slightly to improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing one or more instances of 'приступ' with synonyms like 'права' (rights) or 'дозволе' (permissions).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'granted access' is translated as 'kojima je dat pristup'. A more natural translation would be 'koji imaju pristup' or 'za koje je obezbeđen pristup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: koji imaju pristup

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'Molimo vas' is slightly formal and could be replaced with a comma for a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Molimo vas, imate na umu:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "被授予访问权限的用户的房间" (rooms of users who were granted access) is a bit awkward and literal. It doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would focus on the imported folders being treated as rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 共享文件夹会被导入至“房间”部分，作为用户已访问的房间，或 共享文件夹会被导入至“房间”部分，并将这些文件夹以用户已访问的房间形式呈现。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a single, long sentence. Breaking it into two sentences would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 共享文件夹会被导入至“房间”部分，作为用户已访问的房间。请注意：导入过程中某些访问权限可能会丢失。
